comments.comments_text: A quickly taken corner by Manchester City.

comments.comments_text: A long cross from the side is directed to the well-positioned Riyad Mahrez (Manchester City), but the defence gets it clear. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Manchester City.

comments.comments_text: Norwich have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.

comments.comments_text: Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.

comments.comments_text: Teemu Pukki (Norwich) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Norwich will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Phil Foden (Manchester City) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low inside the right post. It's 0:2.
